entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

Application Description

Prefere sentar na janela ou no corredor? Quer a mesa de canto? VocÃª Ã© a alma da festa ou quer sÃ³ curtir na sua? Em Is This Seat Taken?, sua missÃ£o Ã© organizar grupos de pessoas de acordo com as preferÃªncias de cada um. Ã‰ um jogo de quebra-cabeÃ§as lÃ³gico, confortÃ¡vel e sem pressÃ£o, no qual vocÃª decide quem senta onde. Seja no cinema, em um Ã´nibus cheio, em uma festa de casamento ou em um tÃ¡xi lotado, cada cenÃ¡rio traz personagens novos com gostos especÃ­ficos. Um dos convidados pode ter um nariz sensÃ­vel e nÃ£o vai gostar de sentar perto de um estranho usando perfume forte. Um dos passageiros estÃ¡ com sono e vai odiar tentar dormir ao lado de alguÃ©m ouvindo mÃºsica alta. VocÃª vai ter que analisar tudo isso e encontrar os lugares perfeitos! Nat sempre quis fazer filmes. Sua vida vira de pernas para o ar quando vÃª uma forma igual Ã  sua na telona. Essa descoberta levarÃ¡ Nat a uma viagem pelo mundo para encontrar sua estrela preferida e descobrir como se encaixar nesse mundo. Siga a aventura emocionante de Nat viajando de cidade em cidade, cada uma com suas prÃ³prias fases, personagens e charme. - VocÃª Ã© responsÃ¡vel por acomodar essas figuras cheias de caprichos. - Descubra as personalidades de cada um, sejam eles gente comum, gente bizarra ou algo no caminho. - Resolva quebra-cabeÃ§as satisfatÃ³rios sem se preocupar com tempo ou placares. - Desbloqueie novos cenÃ¡rios ao avanÃ§ar no jogo, de viagens de Ã´nibus atÃ© banquetes!

Application Description

O Incredibox permite que vocÃª crie sua prÃ³pria mÃºsica com a ajuda de uma equipe divertida de beatboxers. Escolha seu estilo musical para comeÃ§ar a criar, gravar e compartilhar suas mixagens. Entre no ritmo com batidas de hip-hop, electro waves, vozes de pop, swing jazzy, ritmos brasileiros e muito mais. AlÃ©m disso, descubra uma seleÃ§Ã£o de mods criados pela comunidade. Muita coisa para vocÃª mixar por horas, sem propagandas ou microtransaÃ§Ãµes. Parte jogo, parte ferramenta, o Incredibox Ã© acima de tudo uma experiÃªncia audiovisual que se tornou um sucesso rapidamente entre pessoas de todas as idades. A combinaÃ§Ã£o certa de mÃºsica, grÃ¡ficos, animaÃ§Ã£o e interatividade torna o Incredibox ideal para todo mundo. E por tornar o aprendizado divertido e interessante, o Incredibox Ã© usado por escolas no mundo inteiro. Como jogar? FÃ¡cil! Arraste e solte Ã­cones nos avatares para fazÃª-los cantar e comece a compor sua prÃ³pria mÃºsica. Encontre as combinaÃ§Ãµes de sons certas para desbloquear refrÃµes animados que vÃ£o aprimorar sua melodia. Assim que sua composiÃ§Ã£o estiver boa, basta salvÃ¡-la e compartilhar para conseguir o mÃ¡ximo de votos possÃ­vel. Se vocÃª conseguir votos suficientes, poderÃ¡ entrar para a histÃ³ria do Incredibox ao entrar no Top 50! EstÃ¡ pronto para mostrar seu talento? Ã‰ possÃ­vel tambÃ©m baixar sua mixagem como MP3 no app e ouvi-la repetidamente! EstÃ¡ com preguiÃ§a de criar sua prÃ³pria mixagem? Sem problema, deixe o modo automÃ¡tico tocar por vocÃª! Aumente o som e curta ;) **************** Incredibox, criaÃ§Ã£o do estÃºdio So Far So Good, com sede em Lyon, na FranÃ§a, foi criado em 2009. ComeÃ§ando como uma pÃ¡gina da web, foi entÃ£o lanÃ§ado como um app para celular e tablet e se tornou um sucesso imediato. Ganhou vÃ¡rios prÃªmios e apareceu em diversas mÃ­dias internacionais, incluindo: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx e muitas outras. A demo online atraiu mais de 100 milhÃµes de visitantes desde sua criaÃ§Ã£o.

entry.content:

  • æ•…äº‹æ¨¡å¼+è‡ªç”±æ¨¡å¼åˆé›†ï¼š9,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 4,99Â â‚¬ [4,99Â â‚¬ ~ 9,99Â â‚¬]

Priceï¼šGratuito

Compras integradas

  • åŠ‡æƒ…æ¨¡å¼ï¼š2,99Â â‚¬
  • è‡ªç”±æ¨¡å¼ï¼š2,99Â â‚¬
  • æ•…äº‹æ¨¡å¼+è‡ªç”±æ¨¡å¼åˆé›†ï¼š4,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

ã€Game Introductionã€‘ 'Call of Knights' is an RPG card pixel-style game developed by Olive Panda Studio. It is divided into two parts: 'Song of the Knight' and 'Shining Stars,' each offering unique gameplay and content. The game adopts paid download, in-app purchase to unlock model to access all gameplay content. ã€In-App Purchases Unlockã€‘ Full Content Unlock: $8.99 USD Story Mode of Song of the Knight: $4.99 USD Free Mode of Shining Stars: $4.99 USD Both modes support experiencing before paying for unlocking. 'Song of the Knight' can be experienced for free until the end of the second chapter, and 'Shining Stars' offers free gameplay for one year. Note: The amounts will be converted based on the local exchange rate. 'Song of the Knight': The story is adapted from the Nobel Prize-winning author Henrik Hien's 'The Knights of the Cross.' The main gameplay involves RPG role-playing with cards, incorporating a partner skill combo system during card battles. Different cards played release exclusive skills, constructing various playstyles. Players will also meet and recruit numerous companions, embarking on an epic journey. 'Shining Stars': The game is set in a magical continent called Antana, featuring six countries with diverse customs. Players take on the role of a small lord in one of the kingdoms. As the demonic realm is about to invade the continent, players must travel far and wide to find companions for their knightly order, establish their own knightly order, embark on adventures, strengthen their abilities, and defend the human frontlines. ã€Device Supportã€‘ Â· iOS 10.0 and above Â· Operating memory of 3GB and above Â· iPhone 7 and above Â· iPad Air 3 and above ã€Contact Usã€‘ If you need assistance during the game or encounter issues, feel free to contact us via email. Official Email: knight@longyougame.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Advanced Comprehension Therapy
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š29,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 22,99Â â‚¬ [22,99Â â‚¬ ~ 29,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š22,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Train your brain to listen carefully with this professional speech therapy app. Three activities help you to understand sentences, follow directions, and improve language processing. If youâ€™re looking for a speech therapy app for adults and older children with communication and cognitive impairments that takes understanding beyond single words, this app is for you. ** Try for FREE by downloading Advanced Language Therapy Lite ** Advanced Comprehension Therapy will help you find where comprehension breaks down, then help you build it back up with 3 classic speech therapy activities targeting sentence-level listening and reading comprehension. 1) IDENTIFY the picture that matches the sentence, increasing in syntactic complexity. Start by finding the picture that matches a sentence like â€œThe baby sleeps.â€ Work up to finding â€œThe grandparent is told a secret by the childâ€ from closely related pictures. * 11 levels of difficulty for understanding sentences with nearly 700 unique trials * Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension * Includes up to 3 nouns, indirect objects, reversible sentences, & passives 2) BUILD a sentence by focusing on each word & how they all fit together. Arrange the words one-by-one to match the pictured sentence you hear. Start with 3 words and work up to 9. * 20 sentence types in nearly 1200 unique trials * Add up to 3 extra words for an added challenge * Tricky "little words" like articles, pronouns, and prepositions * Hear each word as you touch it 3) FOLLOW directions of increasing difficulty in 1-, 2-, & 3-step commands. Start with exercises like â€œTouch the pencil.â€ Work up to brain-bending challenges like â€œBefore you touch the large yellow striped circle, touch the small blue solid star.â€ * 16 levels of difficulty for following directions * Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension * Includes basic, temporal, & conditional commands in a hierarchy of 1-, 2-, & 3-step directions In All Activities: * Enjoy 1000â€™s of unique stimuli with hundreds of photos * Use hints when you get stuck so you always finish successfully * Track progress with detailed e-mail reports * Record yourself on-screen and send it when youâ€™re finished * Repeat audio at any time, or repeat slowly for easier understanding * Designed with adults in mind but easy enough for children to use * No subscriptions, no monthly bills, no Wi-Fi needed ------------------------------------------------- Who is Advanced Comprehension Therapy For? * Speech-Language Pathologists * Adults with Aphasia (mild-moderate) * Stroke & TBI Survivors * Children with Autism or Language Learning Difficulties * Anyone who has mastered the single words in Comprehension Therapy or Language 4-in-1 & wants to take their therapy to the next level! ------------------------------------------------- Which Skills Does This App Target? * Auditory Comprehension (listening) * Reading Comprehension * Attention to Detail * Working Memory (holding information) * Nouns & Pronouns (he/she/it/they) * Adjectives (colors, size, shading) * Syntactic Processing (understanding grammar) * Temporal Concepts (before/after) * Conditional Directions (if/then) * Problem Solving (using hint/repeat or fixing errors) ------------------------------------------------- Download now to get started â€“ or try it for FREE with Advanced Language Therapy Lite! Looking for something different in a speech therapy app? We offer a wide range to choose from. Find the right one for you at tactustherapy.com/find

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Pro Camera by Moment
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š9,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 5,99Â â‚¬ [5,99Â â‚¬ ~ 9,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š5,99Â â‚¬

Compras integradas

  • Pro Bundle - Limited Discountï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • Pro Bundleï¼š5,99Â â‚¬
  • Slow Shutterï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • Time-lapseï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • Unlock Slow Shutter - Limitedï¼š2,99Â â‚¬
  • Unlock Time-lapse - Limitedï¼š2,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Pro Camera by Moment is the manual camera app that gives you full creative control and professional-level performance, all at an affordable price. It brings us closer to what we love about our DSLR and mirrorless cameras â€“ exposure controls, precise focus, rich colors, smooth video, crisp audio â€“ without being complicated. If you are looking for a powerful and easy-to-use camera app, Pro Camera is for you. We make it fast and intuitive to switch between modes, dial in your shot, and keep shooting. Plus, we give you all the manual controls youâ€™ll need: shutter speed, ISO, white balance, focus, and more. Your favorite settings can be saved and recalled on demand. For filmmakers â€“ the features you need, not the ones you donâ€™t. LUTs, color spaces, bitrates, dual-channel audio meters, real-time waveforms, fast access to frame rates, and more. For photographers â€“ easier than shooting on your DSLR. Shoot in RAW (even in bursts), capture brackets, and more. You can even create stunning timelapses and light trail effects (in-app purchase required). For everyone else â€“ inspired by the pros we made the interface simple, fast, and easy to use. We provide getting started tips, video tutorials, and full-time customer service to get you set up. We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment. GENERAL FEATURES + Full manual: control shutter speed, iso, exposure, focus, and white balance with easy-to-use sliders + Focus peaking: manually dial in your focus using highlighted in-focus regions + Zebra stripes: quickly determine over- and under-exposed areas in the viewfinder + Split focus and exposure: take control of tricky lighting scenarios + Viewfinder grid: choose from thirds, square, and golden ratio + Gyroscope: ensure your shot is level with an on-screen gyroscope and haptic feedback PHOTOGRAPHY FEATURES + RAW and TIFF: shoot photos in RAW/ProRAW format for better editing, or TIFF for high-quality printing + RAW+JPG option: simultaneously get the best of both worlds + Burst mode: capture burst shots in RAW format â€“ capture action while maintaining the uncompressed quality pros want with RAW + Bracketing: capture multiple exposures to stack later in your favorite editing apps FILMMAKER FEATURES + Import, organize, and use your favorite LUTs + Color spaces: choose between Rec.709, Rec.2020 HDR, Display P3, and Apple Log (on compatible devices) + Codecs: shoot in HEVC, H.264, or any of the 422 ProRes variants + Video bitrates: get precise control over video quality with standard, medium, and high bitrate options + RGB histogram: dial in your video color, balance, and exposure + Waveform monitor: evaluate video brightness and exposure across your shot in real time + Audio meters: get just the right sound levels with real-time, precise, dual-channel audio levels + HDMI clean feed output: preview on a bigger screen + Video stabilization: make your videos buttery smooth + Video formats: change your resolution and frame rate on screen, without digging into a settings menu + Anamorphic: use the Moment Anamorphic lens to shoot amazing, letterbox style photos and videos, with a de-squeeze option built in PREMIUM FEATURES (In-App Purchases) + Timelapse mode: capture stunning time-lapse videos + Slow Shutter mode: long exposure shots with motion blur or light trails WORKS WITH + iPhone 16 Camera Control: get quick access to manual settings + Lens control: manually control which of the triple/dual lenses you want to shoot with so you can use Moment lenses over each one + Moment lenses: access options like anamorphic de-squeeze and distortion correction + Moment battery case: works with the DSLR-like shutter button on our photography cases for half-press and full-press capture. Take better photos, faster. + Apple Watch: use your watch as a remote to shoot photos or record videos + Siri Shortcuts: quick access to capture a photo or start a video

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: SessionBand Jazz Fusion
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š8,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 2,99Â â‚¬ [2,99Â â‚¬ ~ 8,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š2,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

SessionBand Jazz Fusion â€“ Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the worldâ€™s only chord-based loop app. With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists. Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others. For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea â€“ Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne â€“ Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...). Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles! Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier. Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks. Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com The fastest way to create your own studio-quality music: â€¢ Pick one of 15 Jazz Fusion styles â€¢ Choose your chords â€¢ Stretch or shorten loops â€¢ Build up your track in minutes â€¢ Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos â€¢ Auto-transpose your entire track â€¢ Add FX â€¢ Mix your track â€¢ Adjust track tempo â€¢ Record direct to audio â€¢ Copy straight to other music apps â€¢ Share with the world! The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians: â€¢ Practice with your own world-class band â€¢ Loop markers let you focus on specific sections â€¢ Mute instrument channels as you like â€¢ Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly â€¢ 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos â€¢ Transpose your whole track instantly You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free! â€¢ Simple, intuitive interface â€¢ Audition the loop you are about to insert â€¢ â€˜Track Builderâ€™ allows simple creation of a full track â€¢ Intuitive mixing and record functions Detailed Product Information: â€¢ 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles: Acoustic Rock; 70s Funk; Pop Rock; Neo Soul; Psychedelic Soul; 70s Soul; Jazz Rock; Disco Funk; Neo Classical; Latin Fusion; Indie Pop; Electro Pop; Electro Jazz; DnB; Groovy Six Four â€¢ Tempos from 60bpm to 200bpm â€¢ 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj â€˜stopâ€™ â€¢ 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove â€¢ The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps â€¢ All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

entry.title: SessionBand Jazz 4
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š5,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 2,99Â â‚¬ [2,99Â â‚¬ ~ 5,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š2,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Create professional quality jazz tracks to your own chords in minutes with this brand new edition of the award-winning SessionBand jazz app featuring exclusive, royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Piano); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass). Volume 4 is the ultimate jazz play-along and the perfect tool for jazz songwriters. And we have added loads of extra features and tech improvements since Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Here's what you get: 1. 15 chord variations per root note! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic jazz chords 2. 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style 3. Free access to over 150 downloadable jazz standards ready to play along to in any key! 4. Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create 5. New tech enhancements like 'Track Builder' to make the workflow even faster. With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. For this long-awaited edition, we have gone back to mostly classic jazz with a couple of contemporary styles. Among the classics, expect to hear medium, post-bop Wayne Shorter swing styles in four and three, plus Wes Montgomery and Ahmad Jamal-inspired up-tempo swing styles. There's a contemporary Brad Mehldau-type piano and string style in 5/4 and a wonderful carnival-like worldbeat Cuban number with many rich, melodic tenor sax loops to choose from. Create professional jazz tracks to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create, share and publish thousands of stunning royalty-free jazz tracks. Hear the results. Watch the video at www.sessionbandapp.com The fastest way to create your own studio-quality jazz: â€¢ Pick one of 8 jazz styles â€¢ Choose your chords â€¢ Stretch or shorten loops â€¢ Build up your track in minutes â€¢ Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos â€¢ Auto-transpose your entire track â€¢ Add FX â€¢ Mix â€¢ Change tempo â€¢ Record direct to audio â€¢ Copy straight to other music apps â€¢ Share with the world! The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians: â€¢ Practice with your own world-class quartet â€¢ Loop markers let you focus on specific sections â€¢ Mute instrument channels as you like â€¢ Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly â€¢ 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos â€¢ Transpose your whole track instantly â€¢ Download backing tracks for over 150 jazz standards for free (with chord sheets) ready to play. Transpose them with just one touch! Get some of the world's best jazz musicians playing on your tracks: â€¢ Jason Rebello (Piano): Sting; Jeff Beck; Wayne Shorter; Peter Gabriel... â€¢ Jeremy Stacey (Drums): Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds; King Crimson; Amy Winehouse; Take That; Eric Clapton... â€¢ Patrick Clahar (Sax); Bill Bruford's Earthworks; Incognito; Stevie Wonder; James Brown... â€¢ Geoff Gascoyne (Bass); Sting; Van Morrison; Guy Barker; Georgie Fame... You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free! â€¢ Simple, intuitive interface â€¢ Audition the loop you are about to insert â€¢ â€˜Track Builderâ€™ allows simple creation of a full track â€¢ Intuitive mixing and record functions Detailed Product Information: â€¢ 8 classic and contemporary jazz styles: Elvin Swing; McCoy Three; Mozambique; Sting Swing; Latin Strings; Classical Five; Swing Bass; Up Swing Strings â€¢ Tempos from 107bpm to 190bpm â€¢ 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj â€˜stopâ€™ â€¢ 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove â€¢ The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps â€¢ All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

Application Description

Create studio-quality soul, jazz and funk tracks to your own chords in minutes with the latest edition of the award-winning SessionBand app â€“ the worldâ€™s only chord-based loop app. Featuring exclusive royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Keyboards); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass). Volume 3 is the ultimate soul jazz funk play-along and the perfect tool for songwriters. Here's what you get: â€¢ 15 chord variations per root note in every style! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic soul jazz chords â€¢ 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style â€¢ Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create â€¢ New tech enhancements like â€˜Track Builderâ€™ to make the workflow even faster With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. This latest edition contains a diverse spread of 8 soul jazz funk styles from a Herbie Hancock slow burn, laid-back 70's funk groove all the way through to an exciting, uptempo neo-latin jazz rock groove in 7/4. You can check out samples of all the styles at www.sessionbandapp.com/sessionband-soul-jazz-funk-3-music-app-create-backing-tracks/ SessionBand Soul Jazz Funk 3 is a professional app â€“ essential for anyone learning jazz music and perfect for soul jazz funk musicians looking for the ultimate play-along. But equally, itâ€™s simple enough for non-musicians who love music to create their own great sounding, copyright-free soul jazz funk music and share it with the world â€“ even if they donâ€™t play a note! Create professional soul jazz funk tracks to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create, share and publish thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks. The fastest way to create your own studio-quality tracks: â€¢ Pick one of 8 soul jazz funk styles â€¢ Choose your chords â€¢ Stretch or shorten loops â€¢ Build up your track in minutes â€¢ Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos â€¢ Auto-transpose your entire track â€¢ Add FX â€¢ Mix â€¢ Change tempo â€¢ Record direct to audio â€¢ Copy straight to other music apps â€¢ Share with the world!
